alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 24 at 2:09AM CDT until August 24 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Southern Lake, Aitkin, Carlton, South St. Louis and Pine Counties. In Wisconsin, Douglas, Bayfield and Ashland Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band, the Bad River Reservation, the Red Cliff Band and the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake, Hinckley, Big Sandy Lake and, Lena Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore
